ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (8 ounce) jar oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and cut into thirds
1 bunch fresh basil leaves, washed and dried

cookingTips: Toast crostini lightly so they have structure to hold creamy goat cheese without crumbling
Spread goat cheese while crostini are still warm for easier application
Add sun-dried tomatoes and fresh basil just before serving to maintain texture contrast
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook balance creamy goat cheese with tangy sun-dried tomatoes and bright basil, assembling just before service for optimal texture.
